name: Ukraine war is our war - 2022
description:
NOTE: Follow the blue arrow next to player to reach "check-point" zones. Game takes 7 min max.

Player, as robot comandos, need to destroy Russian oil pipelines system which is used to fund war in Ukraine and as supply system of fuel to Russian army. Player needs to survive attacks of another androids which try to destroy him, and reach green zones, which need to be bombed.

Political background: most Exports from Russia to European Union is oil and gas. The money might be used later on to fund war on Ukraine. We believe - if we cut off supplies of oil and gas - Russian government will bankrupt and we will save Ukraine.

 See:
